message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a decent chunk.  What do you say?
Let's split it closer to 50/50. Inflation will hurt me, so I need a bigger share.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a bigger share to make this worthwhile.  Let's meet in the middle.
I've lost 19% of the value already and it's getting worse. I need a bigger share to make up for the loss.
